summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to the Swedish Medical Center/Ballard by Ordinance 110823 to construct, maintain and operate a pedestrian skybridge over and across Tallman Avenue Northwest, north of Northwest Central Place by changing the name from Swedish Medical Center/Ballard to Swedish Health Services; amending Section 9 to update insurance requirements; and establishing the annual fee for the next five (5) years of the permit.
